ComicInfo.Title: Fit the Ninth: The Lion and the Unicorn
ComicInfo.Summary: Brand New Arc! Perfect Jumping-On Point For New Readers! Join Harvey Award winner Roger Langridge (The Muppet Show, Thor: The Mighty Avenger) for the latest chapter of his critically acclaimed series Snarked! After a perilous high seas journey, our heroes have finally reached their destination: Snark Island. But what dangers will Scarlett, Rusty, the Walrus, and McDunk encounter on their search for the Red King? Find out here!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-25 22:19:55. [CVDB342992]
ComicInfo.Characters: Beaver, Bellman, Billiard Marker, Butcher, Clyde McDunk, Prince Rusty, Queen Scarlet, Red King, Wilburforce J. Walrus
